lang.directions: Cliquez sur un point rouge dans le schéma ou sur l’un des items contenus dans le menu « Equipement » pour découvrir les informations relatives au lubrifiant Mobil™ correspondant. Pour parcourir l’ensemble du schéma, cliquez et déplacez la souris ou utilisez les flèches de déplacement situées sur votre clavier d’ordinateur.
lang.refineYourSearchWithLooble: Affiner votre recherche avec le guide de sélection Looble℠
lang.emailPageLink: Lien pour envoyer un message électronique
lang.touchModeQuestion: Il apparaît que vous êtes en train d’utiliser une tablette ou un appareil à touches tactiles. Souhaitez-vous utiliser une interface tactile optimisée ?
lang.yesUseTheTouchVersion: Oui, je préfère utiliser la version tactile

products.name: Mobilith SHC™
products.information: High-performance synthetic greases for lubrication of bearings
products.benefits: Excellent wear protection of components; helps with easy start-up at low temperature; helps extend regreasing interval — helping reduce service cost

products.information: High-performance synthetic greases for lubrication of bearings
products.benefits: Excellent wear protection of components; helps with easy start-up at low temperature; helps extend regreasing interval — helping reduce service cost

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 500
products.information: Supreme-performance, synthetic  hydraulic fluids
products.benefits: Wide temperature range and outstanding oxidation stability protects equipment in a range of environments; anti-wear performance and multi-metal compatibility protects critical hydraulic components

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 600
products.information: Synthetic gear, bearing and circulating oil
products.benefits: Helps improve equipment productivity due to reduced unscheduled downtime and maintenance; long gear and bearing life under high-stress operating conditions; helps extend oil life; potential power consumption reduction of up to 3.6% when compared with mineral oils*<br /><br /><font size="11px">*Power consumption relates solely to the fluid performance when compared with conventional (mineral) reference oils of the same viscosity grade. The technology used provides up to 3.6% efficiency compared with the reference when tested in a worm gearbox under controlled conditions. Efficiency improvements will vary based on operating conditions and application.</font>

products.name: Mobil SHC™ Gear
products.information: Synthetic EP gear and bearing oils
products.benefits: Outstanding load carrying and anti-wear properties to assist with improving equipment reliability and life; can replace grease in some applications; high viscosity index and low traction properties

products.name: Mobil Centaur™ XHP
products.information: Calcium Sulfonate greases intended for wide variety of applications in severe operating conditions
products.benefits: Excellent extreme-pressure protection and structural stability in water-saturated environments to protect heavily loaded equipment

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™
products.information: Greases intended for wide variety of applications in severe operating conditions including many industrial sectors
products.benefits: Excellent adhesion and cohesion properties; high mechanical stability helping provide extended relubrication intervals; helps resist water intrusion; helps improve equipment reliability

products.name: Mobil Vacuoline™ 100
products.information: High quality circulating oils with excellent rust and corrosion protection
products.benefits: Specifically designed for long fluid life with outstanding demulsibility to help reduce downtime

products.name: Mobil Delvac™ 1300 Super
products.information: Extra high-performance diesel engine oils that help extend engine life in the most severe on and off-highway applications while delivering outstanding performance in modern, high-output, low-emission engines including those with Exhaust Gas Recirculation (EGR) and After treatment Systems with Diesel Particulate Filters (DPFs) and Diesel Oxidation Catalysts (DOCs)
products.benefits: Potential for reduced low-temperature sludge build up and high-temperature deposits; lower oil costs due to less make-up oil during operation; excellent low-temperature pumpability; long life of critical wear surfaces
